metadata.title: CVE-2016-9136 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Artifex Software, Inc. MuJS before a0ceaf5050faf419401fe1b83acfa950ec8a8a89allows context-dependent attackers to obtain sensitive information by usingthe "crafted JavaScript" approach, related to a "Buffer Over-read" issue.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
